author: wrowe
msg: Apply the patch to clean up the flow of code.  This still doesn't
entirely resolve the /foo/ -> /foo/index.html symlink problems, but
that still is waiting for a patch which I haven't been able to wrap.

author: wrowe
msg: With no further feedback in the past two weeks, finally make ldap
buildable on the 2.0 releases on Win32 (without extra hoops of various
ldap toolkits, etc.)  This change will require the user to have the
Win32 client kit installed, which is available for NT as a seperate
download and provided with 2k/XP.  It's really not that conceivable
that someone working in a 9x only environment will need this, but their
client is available on the 2k distribution CDs.
